TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CTFontDescriptor extends MonoMac.CoreFoundation.CFType

Docs.summary: Font Descriptors contain a description of font features that can identify a font.

remarks.para: Font Descriptors contain a description of font features and can completely identify a font. Sometimes the description is not complete enough, and the system will pick a font that matches the specified parameters.

MemberSignature.Value: public CTFontDescriptor (MonoMac.CoreText.CTFontDescriptorAttributes attributes);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class MonoMac.CoreText.CTFontDescriptorAttributes attributes) cil managed

Docs.param: Font attributes to use for the font descriptor.
Docs.summary: Creates a font descriptor from a set of attributes.

MemberSignature.Value: public CTFontDescriptor (string name, float size);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, float32 size) cil managed

Docs.param: PostScript name for the font to create.
The desired size. If the size is zero, the font is treated as if the size had not been specified.
Docs.summary: Creates a font descriptor from a PostScript name (and optional size).

Docs.summary: Creates a font descriptor from this font descriptor, with the specified feature set.
Docs.returns: A new CTFontDescriptor representing the specified feature.
Docs.remarks: This is a convenience method that creates new CTFontDescriptors with a single feature altered.
